TopicTitle: Game crashed on revert to SPH

Articles.Content:
Game Version: 1.0.2

OS: Windows 7 Enterprise 64 bit

Game is running through Steam

Files saved on Google Drive:

Crash Report (rar file)

dxdiag.txt

Craft

My game crashed after I tested out a simple airplane. I launched the plane directly from the runway. After flying over to the island runway (and landing almost successfully), I reverted to launch. I realized I didn't want to launch again, so I reverted to the SPH. I saw my plane for a second in the SPH, and then the game immediately crashed. That's about it.
